verses.verse: Ye are the children <S%H1121><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: ye shall not cut <S%H1413><s%> yourselves <S%H7760><s%>, nor make any baldness <S%H7144><s%> between your eyes <S%H5869><s%> for the dead <S%H4191><s%>.

For thou art a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> thee to be a people <S%H5971><s%> for his own possession <S%H5459><s%>, above all peoples <S%H5971><s%> that are upon <S%H6440><s%> the face of the earth <S%H127><s%>.
Thou shalt not eat <S%H398><s%> any abominable thing <S%H8441><s%>.
These are the beasts <S%H929><s%> which ye may eat <S%H398><s%>: the ox <S%H7794><s%>, the sheep <S%H7716><s%>, and the goat <S%H5795><s%>,

the hart <S%H354><s%>, and the gazelle <S%H6643><s%>, and the roebuck <S%H6643><s%>, and the wild goat <S%H689><s%>, and the pygarg <S%H1788><s%>, and the antelope <S%H8377><s%>, and the chamois <S%H2169><s%>.

And every beast <S%H929><s%> that parteth <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%>, and hath the hoof <S%H6541><s%> cloven <S%H8157><s%> in <S%H8156><s%> two <S%H8147><s%>, and cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%>, among the beasts <S%H929><s%>, that may ye eat <S%H398><s%>.

Nevertheless these ye shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of them that chew <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%>, or of them that have the <S%H6536><s%> hoof <S%H6541><s%> cloven <S%H8156><s%>: the camel <S%H1581><s%>, and the hare <S%H768><s%>, and the coney <S%H8227><s%>; because they chew <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%> but part <S%H6536><s%> not the hoof <S%H6541><s%>, they are unclean unto you <S%H2931><s%>.

And the swine <S%H2386><s%>, because he parteth <S%H6536><s%> the hoof <S%H6541><s%> but cheweth not the cud <S%H1625><s%>, he is unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you <S%H1320><s%>: of their flesh ye shall not eat <S%H398><s%>, and their carcasses <S%H5038><s%> ye shall not touch <S%H5060><s%>.
These ye may eat <S%H398><s%> of all that are in the waters <S%H4325><s%>: whatsoever hath fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> may ye eat <S%H398><s%>;
and whatsoever hath not fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> ye shall not eat <S%H398><s%>; it is unclean unto you <S%H2931><s%>.
Of all clean <S%H2889><s%> birds <S%H6833><s%> ye may eat <S%H398><s%>.
But these are they of which ye shall not eat <S%H398><s%>: the eagle <S%H5404><s%>, and the gier-eagle <S%H6538><s%>, and the ospray <S%H5822><s%>,
and the glede <S%H7201><s%>, and the falcon <S%H344><s%>, and the kite <S%H344><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>,
and every raven <S%H6158><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>,
and the ostrich <S%H1323><s%>, and the night-hawk <S%H8464><s%>, and the sea-mew <S%H7828><s%>, and the hawk <S%H8464><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>,
the little owl <S%H3563><s%>, and the great owl <S%H3244><s%>, and the horned owl <S%H8580><s%>,
and the pelican <S%H6893><s%>, and the vulture <S%H7360><s%>, and the cormorant <S%H7994><s%>,
and the stork <S%H2624><s%>, and the heron <S%H601><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>, and the hoopoe <S%H1744><s%>, and the bat <S%H5847><s%>.
And all winged <S%H5775><s%> creeping things <S%H8318><s%> are unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you <S%H398><s%>: they shall not be eaten.
Of all clean <S%H2889><s%> birds <S%H5775><s%> ye may eat <S%H398><s%>.

Ye shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of anything that dieth of itself <S%H5038><s%>: thou mayest give <S%H5414><s%> it unto the sojourner <S%H1616><s%> that is within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, that he may eat <S%H398><s%> it <S%H4376><s%>; or thou mayest sell it unto a foreigner <S%H5237><s%>: for thou art a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>. Thou shalt not boil <S%H1310><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> in its mother <S%H517><s%>'s milk <S%H2461><s%>.

Thou shalt surely <S%H6237><s%> tithe <S%H6237><s%> all the increase <S%H8393><s%> of thy seed <S%H2233><s%>, that which cometh forth <S%H3318><s%> from the field <S%H7704><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> by year <S%H8141><s%>.

And thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, in the place <S%H4725><s%> which he shall choose <S%H977><s%>, to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell <S%H7931><s%> there <S%H4643><s%>, the tithe of thy grain <S%H1715><s%>, of thy new wine <S%H8492><s%>, and of thine oil <S%H3323><s%>, and the firstlings <S%H1062><s%> of thy herd <S%H1241><s%> and of thy flock <S%H6629><s%>; that thou mayest learn <S%H3925><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> always <S%H3117><s%>.

And if the way <S%H1870><s%> be too long <S%H7235><s%> for thee <S%H3588><s%>, so that thou art not able <S%H3201><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> it <S%H4725><s%>, because the place is too far <S%H7368><s%> from thee <S%H3068><s%>, which Jehovah thy God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>, to set <S%H7760><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there <S%H3068><s%>, when Jehovah thy God <S%H430><s%> shall bless thee <S%H1288><s%>;

then shalt thou turn <S%H5414><s%> it into money <S%H3701><s%>, and bind up <S%H6696><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> in thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, and shalt go <S%H1980><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>:

and thou shalt bestow <S%H5414><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> for whatsoever thy soul <S%H5315><s%> desireth <S%H183><s%>, for oxen <S%H1241><s%>, or for sheep <S%H6629><s%>, or for wine <S%H3196><s%>, or for strong drink <S%H7941><s%>, or for whatsoever thy soul <S%H5315><s%> asketh <S%H7592><s%> of thee <S%H398><s%>; and thou shalt eat there before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and thou shalt rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, thou and thy household <S%H1004><s%>.
And the Levite <S%H3881><s%> that is within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, thou shalt not forsake <S%H5800><s%> him <S%H2506><s%>; for he hath no portion nor inheritance with thee <S%H5159><s%>.

At the end <S%H7097><s%> of every three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> thou shalt bring forth <S%H3318><s%> all the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of thine increase <S%H8393><s%> in the same year <S%H8141><s%>, and shalt lay it up <S%H3240><s%> within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>:

and the Levite <S%H3881><s%>, because he hath no portion <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with thee <S%H1616><s%>, and the sojourner, and the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and the widow <S%H490><s%>, that are within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, shall come <S%H935><s%>, and shall eat <S%H398><s%> and be satisfied <S%H7646><s%>; that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> thee in all the work <S%H4639><s%> of thy hand <S%H3027><s%> which thou doest <S%H6213><s%>.
